ygData.subject: Re: Paw advice
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I have heard of 3 different ways to get him to spawn. I only tried one, and it worked the one i did was... I was told to keep killing everything that
ygData.messageBody:
Well I have heard of 3 different ways to get him to spawn.
I only tried one, and it worked the one i did was...


I was told to keep killing everything that spawns in the room opposite the
door where the elf skele spawns. (The room with the broken stairs and
the locked door leading to floor 3).

I can't confirm that this is indeed how you do it other than the fact that
the person who told me knows A LOT of tricks in the game. And that it did
spawn after I spent about an hour clearing out that room.


The other two had to do with another named character in befallen, (I
belive its LLROD or Irod or something..)
One of them was to kill this character
the other one was to give him a note which is part of a dark elf quest...


On Fri, 3 Sep 1999 Sean.Stephen@... wrote:

> From: Sean.Stephen@...
>
> So I have to wander the halls of befallen for all eternity then ? Or is
> there a way of getting him to spawn ?
>
> thanks,
> Sean
>
>
>
>
>

>

>
>

> From: "Mr. J Daniels" <warpig@...>
>
> No it is not, the mummy roams on the upper levels, when I killed him he
> was in the big rock stair that curves around and down.
>
>

> > Named Mummy in Befallen who drops the Platinum ring spawns on the 3rd
> level
> > just inside the hidden wall or not ?
> >
> > Thanks,
> >
> > Seanie,
